Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: A nice cafe run by Italians. Their coffee menu is very detailed in coffee bean origin and taste. They also offer a range of hot meals.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text:
Comparing to Italian restaurants it's pretty low quality.
Coffee is sour. Cannoli ( Italian dessert ) is empty inside also way to sweet and price went up from ‚Ç¨4 to ‚Ç¨5 definitely not worth.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: An absolutely amazing Cafe! Great coffee, pastries, and panini! The atmosphere is casual yet fun and still quiet enough to sit down and study, couldn't recommend enough :)

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Very nice place for breakfast or brunch. Seems like maybe the owners are Italian. Coffee is amazing! Roma blend was terrific and I have enjoyed my food and service too. Recommend!

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Great coffee, wide variety choice. Amazing cannolo

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: perfect coffee and sweets. didn‚Äôt find this in any of the best of lists in amsterdam even though they beat every third wave coffee joint in town. highly recommended to everybody and a must-visit for coffee enthusiasts

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Food and coffee are delicious but the chairs are pretty uncomfortable and the environment is not that cozy. The cat is cute, but was jumping on the tables to drink from water glasses from patrons who had left. This is pretty unsanitary‚Äîparticularly for pregnant women.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Real Italians making your coffee! Great taste and different selection of coffee beans, also some typical Northern Italian lunch choices (variations with bread). No queue compared to their neighbors.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text:
I bring anyone who visits me here.

Cozy space, good coffee, solid food, and a cute and chubby cafe cat. The staff ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text:
The Chemex coffeemaker in the shop-window already made it for me when passing by, so we stopped and had an amazing breakfast there.
Run by an italian family and a cat who occupied the cosiest spot during our ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text:
Nice selection of specialty coffee.
Vegan milk options and home made pastries.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Great coffee, delicious biscuits and friendly staff ! 100% would return when i come back to amsterdam !

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Quality coffee place! Super friendly bartenders and a cook making meal with love and attention :) everyone is welcome to pet the cat :P

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text:
Cozy place. Great staff. Beautiful cat :)
We ordered breakfast. It included smoothy, orange juice, coffee, croissant with jam/nutella, eggs with pieces of hamon, cheese and toasts, yogurt with granola.. So everything was great and fast! I want visit this place in my next journey to Amsterdam.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Awesome Italian style coffee to drink paired with delicious biscuits and tarts

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Lovely place with a nice atmosphere and friendly Italian owner. There‚Äôs a good variety of coffee and gluten free and vegan delicacies.  Lots of funny decor as well. The place also adapted to COVID-19 well. 10/10 would recommend.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: One of the best coffee in Amsterdam. They used the SANEREMO coffee machine, which is one of the best machines. Also, they sell some Italian snack, beverage, olives oil and cheese.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Great coffee and tasty chocolate croissant. I especially liked the feeling of a local neighborhood cafe with very friendly environment

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: It's okay. Better to go there, when it's not overcrowded. Don't order omelette. It's small and on a bread.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Great place! The coffee is exquisite and the staff is very friendly and helpful. Thank you.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Nice place with friendly staff, excellent paninis and tasty coffee!

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: A cozy Italian Cafe close to Market and the museum. The coffee and snacks were fresh and delicious üòã.  The service was impeccable üëå.  Definitely will be returning soon again.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Different selection of special coffee beans from all over the world. italian vibe of the personnel, you are transported in Italy as soon as you enter. Gluten free cake available

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: After 4 years of living in Amsterdam, trying more than 50 places all over town, this is one of the best places to get high quality coffee. Period.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: We will be back. Lovely welcoming atmosphere, friendly Italian staff. Extensive coffee menu. I chose a Mexican bean, espresso macchiato. It was divine, as was the lemon and almond cake. My daughter was equally impressed with her choices. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Always a fan of this place ‚Äî the coffee, atmosphere, and lovely staff.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text:
Amazing coffee, great dulce, also arancini, this place has everything.
The staff is also really nice

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: When looking for a good coffee in the area, this is my preferred place to go. They make a strong coffee, with the exact decent amount of foam when ordering a cappuccino, which are also extremely reasonably priced. The place might smell a ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Amazing coffee... Super friendly staff :)

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Exquisite Italian coffee, friendly staff and a very cute cat!

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Amazing coffee! Found it on the way to Starbucks because in Amsterdam the coffee was very bad generally and expensive. This coffee shop is amazing, authentic small batch roasting, coffee from all around the world! The barista knows how to ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Great food and a friendly cat to keep you company.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Wonderful coffee and had truly the best sandwich I‚Äôve ever had in my life here. Focaccia with buffalo mozzarella, truffle, prosciutto and arugula. Would highly recommend coming here for a nice easy delicious breakfast!

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Nice cafe, with a really relaxed atmosphere and a very friendly cat. The staff is friendly and welcoming. The coffee is very good, as is their tea. I saw a gluten-free caprese cake on the menu but didn't have time to try it. Will go back for that one, for sure

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Perfect coffee and tasty Italian paninis for breakfast or small lunch (vegetarian options too)

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Went to Amsterdam with 5 other friends, found this place on the first day and went everyday after. Coffee is the best we've had with authentic Italian home roasted coffee fresh every day, the food is very nice with amazing bruschetta and very friendly staff. Definitely coming back when visiting again!

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: For a coffee connoisseur is always a pleasure to find a place where coffee is not only high quality but the service is outstanding, Boutique del Caffe is that place, they roast their coffee there and also have a great selection of specialty ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Lovely Place! Great coffee, fair prices, very nice staff.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: AMAZING breakfasts. And I don‚Äôt use that word so often. Perfect coffee, excellent focaccia, toasts and heavenly Italian Cannolis with mascarpone. Best breakfast in A‚Äôdam. Seriously...and a very friendly owner. 3rd breakfast in a row

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text:
Coffee is GREAT! Amazing staff and always happy vibes.
Authentic italian

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: The best Italian coffee in Amsterdam (Italian owner and staff), lots of locals visit this shop. It's a shop but you can drink a cup of coffee here and have breakfast or lunch. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: My only stop for coffee in de pijp

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: What a great place! The coffee was one of the best I've had in Amsterdam, the staff is warm, friendly and welcoming and the food was excellent. Many places in Amsterdam should take note of how they run this place. I hope to come back soon.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: The best coffee in √Åmsterdam and I tried a loooot of coffee places here in town. Feels like you are in Italy for a moment (until you get the bill) ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: It‚Äôs okay but no highlight. Power breakfast totally overpriced (‚Ç¨16.-) for what you get (mini granola yogurt, mini scrambled eggs and ham and cheese also in dwarf size. It also comes with a croissant with nutella and jam, a very small not ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: A wonderful, authentic Italian place run by Italians. Great breakfast, delicious lunch, amazing coffee and friendly and flexible staff. Limited but cozy outdoor seating on a beautiful and calm street.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: I have been to this place last weekend. When we entered (4 people) we asked the young girl waitress if we can sit on the sofa. She asked how many are we in a very cold way. At the end, even if we were 4, we decided to sit at a table because ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: The beat coffe I had in NL, living 3 years here already! Lovely area and friendly service. Sweets were also delicious. Top!

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Really amazing cappuccino! Staff is Italian which gives a great atmosphere. Nice coffee bar to go with somebody or to read or work.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Coffee is great! People super friendly! Food is not great but is good and abundant. the cups were not super clean

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text:
Had an amazing experience there. A warm ‚Äûciao‚Äú in the beginning and afterwards a good cappuccino and an espresso to try.
Lovely place with a Italian atmosphere. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Live this place. It doesn't want to be Italian. It  IS Italian. Everything is made and presented with love for coffee, tea, food etc. And yes they are proud and they have opinions, like sending away people that order coffee to go but end up ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: The best coffee I have had in Amsterdam... Excellent flavor and good choices of beans. The food is both original and delicious. Very good friendly service also.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Super nice coffee, probably one of the best in Amsterdam. Staff is very friendly and you can enjoy a truly Italian atmosphere. Definitely recommend.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Amazing double chocolate cake. Great coffee

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Came here because the cafe down the road was full and long line. Don't know why this place is 4.6 stars. Coffee was watery, poor consistency/texture of milk and froth. Coffee was not hot. Place was stuffy (hot/humid). ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Large selection of coffee plus a few cakes. Super nice atmosphere and very cozy! You definitely feel the difference with basic coffee shops when you taste it. And the prices are totally acceptable! Worth to stop by!!

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: A truly very very good Italian place, run by Italians who do everything themselves, including roasting the coffee beans. Coffee is full of aroma and better than in many I had in Italy. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Really really good coffee. They also sell the coffee which is nice you can also make it at home. Also the staff was incredibly friendly.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: This cafe is a little gem. Italian flair, self roasted coffee, delicious food and friendly people make this cafe a place to come back to.  Do not miss: Torta della Nonna

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Have been coming there for years! Great place with very friendly owner and staff... and they really know their stuff üòÄ 5x5 stars if that was possible. Espresso heaven.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Modest but very friendly. They own a cat that hosts everyone with a good vibe.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: These Italians roast their own beans in house, and specialize in making the most exquisite espresso blends. The owner Daniele is great, and so is the rest of his crew.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Very friendly, attentive,  staff. The coffee is rich,  Italian coffee. I really enjoy the focaccia sandwiches. The calico shop cat is adorable.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: This is a nice place to get a delish cappuccino. And their arrancino is a must to try! ( Really close to Bakers and Roasters if you want to skip the line;)

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Amazing coffee, delicious cannolo (made fresh to order), and an adorable resident cat. What more could you ask for?

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: If you are from Melbourne, Australia (like me) and obsessed with the perfect cup of coffee then you must come here! They also have excellent organic Italian produce, and wonderful customer service from a gentleman named Ricardo.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: A selection of different freshly roasted coffeebeans to choose from for your coffee. Accompanied with a welcoming italian service and great sandwhiches. Enjoy!

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Cute place and food, but VERY inhospitable! Next to us, two customers had ordered tuna sandwiches but received a tuna melt. Whether this was a mix up from the waiter or the people themselves, the way the waiter handled the issue was ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Amazing coffee with lovely Italian staffs!

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: We were originally planning to go somewhere else but the wait was soo long we ended up just stumbling upon this coffee shop. The pesto here is really good I'd recommend asking them to add on a caprese sandwich!

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: This place has some of the most relaxing sitting areas of any cafe I've been in, also has cat ready for cuddles. Come here for the food stay for the Coffee which is really Italian.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Real Italian coffee and patisserie. Cozy place. One of the most Italian place in town. I always enjoy my breakfast.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Fantastic coffee and good food. People are friendly and excellent environment

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text:
My favourite place in Amsterdam.
Great coffee. Amazing staff. Delicious sweets.
6/5 stars.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: We found this Place After coming out the Heineken esperience and we were so Happy to get a Great coffee and sandwich there, real italian experience the staff was so professional and the owner was the perfect host, we Will come back soon.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Nice and quite place. Nice coffee and goid cakes

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Very good coffee excellent coffee buddies.

1. Omelette ‚Ä¶

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Smooth columbian cappuccino, pleasant place to read and sip your coffee. Friendly staff, free wifi.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Quiet little Italian cafe that also sells bialetti moka pots. Coffee is good, sandwiches are not bad.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Great coffee, great food, really lovely atmosphere.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: Good food & very good coffee, but it can be a bit hectic sometimes. Go here for good coffee, not for peace & quiet ;)

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: For the best of best coffee, in the italian atmosphere. Must visit!

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
Review Text: The cappuccino was nice but that is just about it. The service is pretty poor, they need more staff. I waited 30 minutes for my order and when the food arrived...they got the order wrong. Never again.

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione

Name: La Boutique del Caffe Torrefazione
